Account.CreatedAt.Required: Please enter the Account creation date.
Account.Password.Min: Password must be at least 6 characters.
Account.Password.InvalidFormat: Password must contain at least 1 uppercase letter and 1 special character.
Account.ConfirmPassword.NotMatch: Password and confirm password must be the same
Account.AvatarUrl.Min: Avatar URL must be at least 1 character.
Account.AvatarUrl.Max: Avatar URL must not exceed 500 characters.
Account.VerificationToken.Min: Verification Token must be at least 1 character.
Account.VerificationToken.Max: Verification Token must not exceed 500 characters.
Account.VerificationTokenExpiry.InvalidF: Invalid expiry date format for Verification Token.
Account.ForgotPasswordToken.Min: Forgot Password Token must be at least 1 character.
Account.ForgotPasswordToken.Max: Forgot Password Token must not exceed 500 characters.
Account.ForgotPasswordTokenExpiry.Invali: Invalid expiry date format for Forgot Password Token.
Account.OldPassword.Same: Old password and new password must be different
Account.ForgotPassword.Sent: A confirmation code has been sent if there is a corresponding account. Please check your email. You will be redirected to the sign in page after closing this notification.
Account.ResetPassword.Success: Password recovery successful. You will be redirected to the login page after closing this notification.
Account.SignUp.Success: Please check your email to activate your account. You will be redirected to the homepage after closing this notification.
Account.ResendVerification.Success: A confirmation link has been sent if the email information is valid (an account has been registered with this email and has not been verified). You will be redirected to the login page after closing this notification.
